title: Hero MotoCorp launches community riding platform XCLAN for Xpulse bike owners
description: Hero MotoCorp, the country's largest two-wheeler maker, said the inaugural chapters will be rolled out in five cities across the country - Dehradun, Guwahati, Bengaluru, Cochin and Mumbai - and will be subsequently expanded to additional cities by the latter half of 2022.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
